responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "EF6745BB40DB18AD38EF2ABDC3268A95", "You find a page that displays how to forge metallic triangular pieces together to form what is called an Anchor of Vuul. According to the images, it will snare a demon that posses bodies. It also requires any magical anvil from the mythical fiery abyss, Sulos.")
name: MADD_0002_BookLightkeepConfiguration_9
